attributes.action: Support private renters from extortionate fees that are unaffordable for most
attributes.additional_details:
There may be a strong chance that a high number of private rental tenants could fall into or further into debt. Having a supportive plan in place may help alleviate debt and possible implications of mental health. Social housing has far better security and a drastically lower rental fee. 

Long-term a supportive plan may positively impact the economy, homelessness, and mental health along with keeping the private rental sector down.
attributes.background: With the current cost of living crisis having a negative impact on private renter's, implement an effective plan that supports the needs of private renters such as rental caps and the option of a 24 month contract with a rent freeze.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635142

Decisions about the length of tenancy agreements are a matter for individual landlords.
